text: I’m not a huge action fan, but my husband will only watch “action packed” movies. lol. I chose this one night and it actually kept my attention. He fell asleep, but he literally can’t stay awake for much of anything.
If you have a 10sec fast forward you can trim this movie down to about 10mins of worthwhile viewing,otherwise don’t,seriously,don’t.
Shallow, flat and a total waste of time. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME.
Absolute garbage movie. How did this ever get made?
Depends on what you’re expecting from the movie. There are logical errors, mediocre acting and the ending wasn’t the best. However, it was fun to watch and keeps you in front of the tv.
The acting is solid, but the writing & direction are so bland, this paint-by-the-numbers thriller is passable entertainment.
Not bad, the critics are kidding. I enjoyed it

An action movie with a fairly simple plot. Action is non-stop bolstered by a strong cast. The plot may be basic, however it’s execution is first rate as is the script. I was completely caught up in both the characters and the end result. I’d watch it again and probably will. I highly recommend this movie. For those reviewers that said (laughably) that it was the worst movie they ever saw, let’s just say there’s a strong chance they didn’t watch it.

It entertained for sure. Can't understand the bad rap this gets. Cinematography is good, written well, Goodman directed it well and it has enough suspense with twists and turns. Also frustrates like all suspense dramas should. Whole cast excels in character.

“Last Seen Alive”, es la típica película que protagonizaría Liam Neeson, Jason Statham o en este caso Gerard Butler, dónde la trama siempre se centra en la venganza de un hombre común o de uno que intenta encaminar su vida. Y esta película de cierto modo lo cumple, el conflicto únicamente se basa en cómo Will recuperará a su esposa con el suspenso de si ella sigue aún con vida; y eso es literalmente toda la película, no hay una construcción de personaje interesante, no hay un planteamiento que le agregue matices a la historia, nada de eso, el incidente incitador es la película, no hay más. Y para un domingo esta es la típica película que funciona, porque estaría mintiendo si dijera que esta película me pareció aburrida, realmente cumple su única función de entretener. 

Esta película es un único largo acto, la trama sigue una única línea desde que Lisa es secuestrada en la Gasolinería y no para hasta su resolución; todos los acontecimientos de esta se desarrollan en un máximo de 8 horas, dotando a la trama en momentos de un falso plano secuencia que si funciona. Para mi eso fue el diferenciador de esta a comparación de los miles de películas de Acción solo de la filmografía de Gerard Butler. Un conflicto compacto que se siente ágil y dónde no hay tiempo de desarrollar cualquier otro aspecto que no sea crucial para el conflicto. 

Si tengo que reconocer un aspecto de esta película sin duda fue su escena inicial, una escena que no para en 20 minutos en los que somos testigos de la desesperación de Will por encontrar a su esposa, la escena es lenta, es desesperante y muy tensa, ya que al igual que Will no tenemos contexto de nada, no sabemos quién la secuestró y porque y todo lo que Will va resolviendo es lo mismo que nosotros conocemos. Desde mi punto de vista una gran introducción que se alarga hasta el final. Si, esta cinta está lejos de dejar de ser meramente entretenimiento, pero siempre ver a Gerard Butler es especial, es de esos actores que no importa que tan mala sea la película solo con su presencia hace que te la pases bien, y esta película no fue la excepción.
Certainly not the greatest action movie out there, but it's a decent watch, has a good watch a kept me entertained for 90 minutes.
An enjoyable low budget film, 90 min of action. Butler holds it together. It does feel more like a tv episode than a movie though.

Entretenida, sabe como atraparte y dejarte al borde del asiento. La actuación de Gerard Butler es clave para que funcione, ya que esta en casi todas las escenas. No esperaba mucho pero me gusto, bien filmada y los flash backs sirven mucho para que la historia cumpla.
The worst movie I've seen in the last 5 years... and I saw a lot of horrid movies.

This movie aimed at keeping a simple storyline that is easy to follow while keeping the sequences real - from the disappearance to discovery of the missing person. The story is a cautionary tale filled with sly innuendo. The movie leaves the viewer to take away their own assessment of the key message. My take away is that this scenario can actually happen as described and can actually be resolved as told. We'll done for a realistic movie. They are rare these days.

This movie begins on the wrong foot. It starts by showing a scene that happens later on in the story. I have seen this trope so much; it has driven me crazy. In this case showing the later scene kills part of the tension.

Once that part is out of the way, the movie is actually very gripping. The tension and suspense are all handled quite well. This is where the low budget actually works to the film's advantage. The movie feels grimy, it has this real lived in world feel to it. This visceral feeling helps the audience feel the stress of the protagonist.

It is around the hour mark of the movie that the story loses its grounded sense of reality. The story presented a lot of good mysteries, but the answers are underwhelming.

It is a good half of a movie, and for that, it gets half of a score.
Ciekawa praca kamery "podążająca" za głównym bohaterem. Intrygująca historia, która potrafi wciągnąć i zaciekawić. Zakończenie proste i bajkowe.

What is this BS? Is Gerard James Butler okay who did he piss off that you has to make this crap? Is Gerard James Butler sick like Bruce Willis with aphasia he started making crap movies just to rake in some checks before he could not work anymore. Is this what is happen in this movie? Butler and the other cast must be on drugs, sick, In debt with the IRS or something I have watched better Youtube. story is dumb the plot makes zero logic the mom and dad of the wife suck as people to the point you start to think they maybe part of the crime the cops suck so hard they feel dirty from the word go.
Well executed mystery suspense thriller with an end that twists and turns.
Totally on same page with him. Will do the same things 😝😝
